attributes.action: Consider banning HGVs from large citys and motor ways during the day.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The banning of HGVs from town centres and motorways between the hours of 6am to 9pm would alleviate the serious congestion the UK has on daily basis.
Deliveries can be organised to be made made during 9pm to 6am during the night when the roads are clearer, everybody needs to get to work to earn a living with the minimum amount of stress!

rejection.details: Similar petitions already exist http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Deliveries/ & http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Slow-vehicles/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
